insert into member(ID, PWD, NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, BIRTH, POSNO, ADDR_DEF, TEL, REC_EMAIL) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{posNo}, #{addrDef}, #{tel}, #{recEmail})

insert into review(mno,title,cont,vcnt,spart,stat,reg_date) values(#{memberNo},#{title},#{content},0,#{sugeryPart},#{status},now())
select max(rno) from review
mapper.select: select a.rno as reviewNo, mno as memberNo, a.hno as hospitalNo, a.title as title, a.cont as content, a.vcnt as viewCnt, a.spart as sugeryPart, a.stat as status,b.fil_path as filePath, a.reg_date as regDate from review a inner join review_phot b on a.rno = b.rno
